name: Avion Technology Inc.
tag_list: php, code-igniter, iphone-applications, android-applications, blackberry-applications, java, asp-net, xml, ajax, actionscripting, mysql, sql-server, oracle, joomla, drupal, wordpress, social-engine, jomsocial
overview:
Avion Technology Inc. was formed on July 7th, 2007 in Schaumburg, Illinois. We are a woman-owned, minority-owned, family-run business specializing in web design, web development and legal process outsourcing. We have completed in excess of two hundred web development projects and grown from a team of just 2 to over 40developers, and continue to add more staff to meet the increasing needs of our customers.

We cover the entire spectrum of customer-oriented programming ranging from simple e-commerce solutions to customized web and desktop applications for an enterprise-wide audience.

Our industry expertise includes real estate, healthcare, financial services, telecom, entertainment, travel, transportation, health and fitness. We work with service firms, retail stores, web-only businesses, and manufacturers.

Avion’s talent pool includes developers and designers with extensive experience, a commitment to excellence, and most importantly, a focus on contributing to their customers’ success.

Built on a foundation of honesty and hard work, Avion believes that our net worth is not only measured in dollars, but by what we add to our employees’ and clients’ lives and to society in general.

Why settle for average when you can have superior project management, outstanding technical skills and first-class business knowledge behind your web development? Contact Avion Technology today!
